channel.title: Magic
channel.description: Alright. i dont really know what to title this so i just put magic. on my 317 when i click barrage it barrages the person. but when i click it again. it runs towards the person im trying to barrage and doesn't barrage them. Does anyone know how to make it so when you barrage twice the second barrage waits and then barrages instead of running towards them?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2009, 06:30:27 pm[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2009, 06:51:43 pm[/size][hr] hm
